title: Lags and app crash if have two 1-1 chats [release]
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: There are 2 1-1 chats and each has 2 messages. After app relaunch (kill it and run again) and doing nothing, just waiting for about 3 minutes on my real device Galaxy S6 it crashes. If try to open chats and go back to Chats and switch between tabs - it's slow and then eventually crashes. 

There is no crash reported in TF as it looks like system just shutdowns app and it goes to background and screen for Sign in is shown if switch to it. From TF session I see that memory consumption increases constantly

Happens on build with JSC and without (release build) and on Jan 10 nightly build.

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
no crash, can switch to chats, tabs
#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
crash
### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)
Android app, Release build (no JSC) https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7469768/sessions/9/?accessToken=gy3s4De0SG3UBizpVoURav8uLOs
Android app, Nightly build: https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7463949/sessions/14/?accessToken=VVZbVNbNBTmnjTgmeUiya5EanvM

iOS app, release build no log only memory graph: https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/7470662/sessions/2/?accessToken=sQQ70YkbH8thkArO8FytK--IDxY
iOS app PR 2994 build with same issue but with logs! https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/7470587/sessions/8/?accessToken=HuTz2mxKrTCnOEo2jcM2aFDATcQ
- Open Status
- Other 2 devices should add you are a contact and each of them sends "hello" to you 
- Open 2 new 1-1 chats, Add them as Contact, reply "hi" in each of the 2 chats
- kill the all
- launch app again
- Sign in
- Wait for 5 minutes on Chats screen, if app does not crash - open each of chats, return to Chats, switch to each tab Wallet, Discover, Contacts several times, kill app and log in again


### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 
release build 31 for 0.9.13 (not same as develop) 
Nightly builds from Jan 8,9 and 10
* Operating System: Android 6.0.1 real device Galaxy S6, iPhone 7 plus, iOS 11.0.3

Happens to me in silmulator as well, here what i see in `/data/thumbstones`:

```

```

On @oskarth request made extra investigation
1. Set Location = On in Android Os settings
2. On first run, after adding contacts, opened location command to get a promt and Allowed sharing location (but haven't sent any location to the chat)
3. Relaunched app waited about 2-5 minutes on Chats screen doing nothing with the phone -> app crashed (or went on background, so not visible on foreground and if switch to it then Sign in screen shown instead of Chats, so seems like Android OS kills it)
android: https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7469768/sessions/14/?accessToken=qAQQ3F8r2C-u-N-JBUcvud7znI4
iOS (Still running ok) https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/7469771/sessions/5/?accessToken=kfIpJGZp2qIjnKj8GcNAPxBph/g
4. Performed same steps on same 3 devices using 0.9.12 release build, can run app for at least 10 minutes and it does not crash

```

```

EDIT: See https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/2408 and https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e273568544ee507c65e582bbfeb918663ade746f

EDIT2: Consider verifying with https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/2853

> iOS app PR 2994 build with same issue but with logs! https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/7470587/sessions/8/?accessToken=HuTz2mxKrTCnOEo2jcM2aFDATcQ

Two observations:
- logs stop after 00:25 for some reason
- (private) memory performance keeps increasing from 300mb (presumably) to 1900 at end of 6m, suggesting perhaps a memory leak

On the other hand, memory perf is barely changing (increasing a bit) on Android, so I don't know.

Using nightly build 174 and three devices with fresh accounts: iPhone 6s, iPhone X and Galaxy S8.

- All have each other as contacts
- All send one message to all others
- Wait 5m on chat list screen (phone goes to background)
- No crash on any device

However:

- Go look at each chat and flip tabs, then kill app
- Wait 5m on chat list screen
- Only Galaxy S8 unresponsive for 20-30s then crashes, iPhones fine

UPDATE:
- If i just do flip tabs/kill app -> wait 5m on Galaxy S8 I can't reproduce twice in a row now.
@rasom If you could have a look at this too it'd be great. I'm out of time and ideas right now. @yenda might try bisect.

Logs from debugging by @rasom


I managed to run the app under Instruments, but, frankly no real breakthrough there.
Some of my findings (iOS Simulator, iOS 11.2):
1. STR. For me, it was enough to receive 1-2 messages while being on the "Chats" tab. I joined a public channel (`#status`), restarted the app and it crashed.
2. It is a memory leak. I managed to grow the app to over 3GB in size on my iOS simulator.
3. It looks like the chat list is unable to render the incoming messages when they arrive and freezes there.
4. It is almost certainly a React-side problem. Together with the memory growth, CPU was running hot by 5 JS threads (WebKit's working threads).
5. For some reasons, most of the buttons are unclickable when the problem reproduces. But I can still switch tabs by _swiping_ between them.

Otherwise, I tried to use Chrome Web Dev Tools, but nothing interesting there... I'll try to dig a bit more tomorrow if it won't be solved.
Reopening as @rasom can repro on Android 5 easily. WIP.
Closing as it can't be reproduced on Android 6 anymore, and Android 5 not part of supported OS (lots of general memory leak issues, etc).
